name: Ted Through Time
description:
Ted is looking for Ned in a cave. However, the cave has some weird time altering properties allowing Ted to REWIND time! Help Ted navigate the cave to find Ned!

Submitted to Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Thank you so much for checking out my game! It really means a lot! Feel free to comment suggestions (constructive criticism is okay) and whether or not you enjoyed the game!
